summary: An ordinance relating to the licensing and regulation of "trade stimulant devices", particularly punchboards and "sports events" and the collection of stamp taxes in connection therewith under Ordinance 79335 and to business license taxes paid or payable under Ordinance 72630 in connection with such activities; providing for the employment under temporary nature in connection with an audit and examination in connection therewith, and authorizing expenditures therefor chargeable equally to certain items in the 1957 Budget of the Executive and Legislative Departments.
